info.name: ImthatDESKhere - Zendesk Dark Mode
info.description: A Dark Mode theme for Zendesk with Blue accents.
info.additionalInfo: v0.4.7 - Took a bit of hackery to find, but the ticket info dropdown text-area text is now properly visible (no longer dark text on the darkened box). v0.4.6 - Zendesk changed the ticket tabs to a new set of classes, those are now fixed too. - Darkened ticket CC Bubbles. - Darkened ticket tag Bubbles/Backgrounds. v0.4.5 - Fixed ticket hover drop-ups to be darkened. - Fixed the internal note background colour on the ticket hover (that Zendesk broke again). v0.4.4 - They broke the ticket views sidebar again, so it's fixed. v0.4.3 - Assorted bugfixes. v0.4.2 - Re-darken the "Submit As" ticket submit dropup. v0.4.1 - Ticket Information "Also Viewing" popup fixed. - Added a default override for all spans. v0.4.0 - The Ticket view when under a user and all associated popups and tables have been darkened. v0.3.1 - Zendesk broke the ticket tabs again, so they are fixed. - Ticket Information Tabs are now dark. - Ticket update alert box re-darkened. v0.3.0 - A few fixes from v0.2.2 and v0.2.3 that weren't released. - Fixed the new Ticket View list colour CSS classes. - Ticket hovers are dark! v0.2.1 - Random 4 and 5 letter classes appearing for the same old crud. Now added to the ever increasing list of these with no notable pattern. v0.2.0 - Lots of changes here, not sure which all did get changed. - Fixed more random white tab states (there's like 30 damn classes here, and 2 applied for active or not that keep changing). - Fixed home/dashboard table. - Assorted other table fixes. - Ticket Archived notes darkened. - Ticket Ratings darkened. - Assorted button fixes. v0.1.12 - Random update broke new tab highlights again... Fixed! v0.1.11 - Ticket Updated notification darkened (new update changed css) v0.1.10 - Zendesk randomly changed CSS again - Fixed the random white boxes that appeared on ticket tables v0.1.9 - Ticket Events are now darkened properly v0.1.8 - Random Fixes for the seemingly random changing tab backgrounds... - Ticket Updated Alert now dark v0.1.7 - Random Fixes - Darkened the new Suspended Ticket Action Bar from the Zendesk Update v0.1.6 - Assorted fixes to alternate classes that randomly get applied v0.1.5 - Assorted fixes - Merge Window done v0.1.4 - Fix Ticket Hoverover Popup v0.1.3 - Some dropdown fixes for tickets v0.1.2 - Search Page v0.1.1 - Fixed new Ticket Events - Fixed "Agents Also Viewing this Ticket" v0.1.0 This might be mostly usable now. Still a lot of dropdowns and tooltips will blind you. v0.0.1 A lot of stuff is missing, this is very early!
